brief_title: Phase II Safety and Efficacy Study to Evaluate a Glaucoma Therapy in Open-Angle Glaucoma or Ocular Hypertension Patients
brief_summary: To determine the safety and IOP-lowering ability of a test compound in patients with open-angle glaucoma or ocular hypertension.
criteria: Inclusion Criteria: - Adult subjects of either sex and any race with open-angle glaucoma or ocular hypertension; - logMAR visual acuity not worse than 0.6. Exclusion Criteria: - Clinically relevant ophthalmic or systemic conditions may be excluded.
